meaning_str.bing: conj. 虽然；尽管；不过；即使

虽然；尽管；即使；纵然；然而；但是；不过

1.en: Although I know it's not possible, I can only do all that I let her happy and healthy growth, so don't listen to our words.
1.cn: 虽然我知道这不可能实现，我只能尽我一切让她快乐健康的成长，不用太听我们的话。

2.en: Although some of the original backers of the bill may have had good intentions, most legislators saw it as an opportunity for corruption.
2.cn: 虽然一些最初支持该法案的人可能抱有良好的动机，但大多数立法者认为它会滋生腐败。

3.en: Yet although Tata may have paid over the odds, it got a big confidence boost out of it, as did India as a whole.
3.cn: 虽然出价较高，但塔塔因此收获了巨大的信心，印度整个国家也是如此。

0.en: None taken. Although "repellent" is kind of a strong word.
0.cn: 我没在意，虽然“厌恶”这词儿有点重了。

1.en: Maybe, although the history of science fiction is not on your side.
1.cn: 也许吧，虽然历来的科幻小说都不能苟同这点。

2.en: Although it did get exciting for a minute when Amy inhaled a wool ball.
2.cn: 虽然艾米误吸进一个羊毛球时我稍微开心了一分钟。

3.en: I know. Although I've always hated how my right frontal lobe looks in pictures.
3.cn: 必须的，虽然我不喜欢我的右额叶在X光片上的效果。

4.en: Okay Phoebe, I guess you're next, although I really don't see the point. Yeah.
4.cn: 好了，菲比，下一个是你，虽然我觉得那么做是多余的。好吧。

5.en: I'm thinking of joining an "I Hate Turkey Club." Although, I do love a turkey club.
5.cn: 我考虑要加入“我恨火鸡俱乐部”，虽然我喜欢吃火鸡三明治。

6.en: Merry Newton mas, everyone. I sense that's not sincere, although I have no idea why.
6.cn: 祝大家“牛诞快乐”，虽然说不上原因，但我觉得你这祝福并不真诚。

7.en: And I wept like a child, not because I was overwhelmed at having survived, although I was.
7.cn: 我像个小孩一样嚎啕大哭，不是因为获救的激动，虽然这也是事实。

8.en: Although tiny, these weapons led to one of the biggest extinctions of mammals in Earth's history.
8.cn: 虽然渺小，这些利器却曾导致史上哺乳动物灭绝的最严重事件。

9.en: Your final...? Wait. I didn't even know you were sick. Although you have been looking a little....
9.cn: 你的最后...等等，我都不知道你病了，虽然你看上去是有点...

10.en: Wow, free crab cakes? Well, that's nice. Although I was hoping to have sex tonight. Just the crab cakes.
10.cn: 哇，免费的蟹肉饼吗？真是周到。虽然我本来希望今晚可以做爱的。只要蟹肉饼就行了。

11.en: Yes. Although, I think we may be seeing a little too much of some people. Aren't you a little old to be wearing a dress like that?
11.cn: 对，虽然有些人露的太多了，你不觉得自己太老了，不该穿那种衣服吗？

12.en: Although as I'm saying this, it occurs to me you may have been employing a rhetorical device rendering my response moot.
12.cn: 虽然我现在正这么说，但我感觉你可能已经使用了某种能带修辞的表达装置来使我的回应倍受争议。

13.en: Ms. Dunbar, any statement you make will be part of the public record as part of the DOJ report. Although this video is simply for purposes of...
13.cn: 邓巴女士，你所作的任何陈述都将记入司法部报告，成为公共记录。虽然这段录像只是为了……

14.en: You're talking about me. Very funny. Although I would enjoy drawing up a budget and forcing Raj to adhere to it without an ounce of compassion.
14.cn: 你们说的是我，真好笑。虽然我的确是会享受安排好预算。然后逼拉杰坚持计划。而且丝毫不带任何同情心。

15.en: I never have an off night. Okay? Although, sometimes if I'm a little bloated, I don't feel that sexy. But even then, I'm better than most!
15.cn: 我没有一次不成功的，好吗？虽然有时候如果我吃太饱，可能就不会觉得很性感，但是即使是那样，我都比别人强！

16.en: I met Monica when we were just a couple of six year olds and I became friends with Chandler when he was 25, although he seemed like a six year old.
16.cn: 我认识莫妮卡时我们只是六岁大的小女孩，我们在钱德二十五岁时成了朋友，虽然他看起来很像六岁大的孩子。

17.en: Okay, sounds like he's back on track. Although, some days I'm, like, we've spent so much money. Why haven't we found anything? What are we doing? Oh, boy.
17.cn: 行，听起来又重回正轨了。虽然有时候我会觉得，我们花了钱啊。怎么屁都没找到？我们是在干嘛啊？哎妈。

18.en: I read an article in the paper the other day that said that although US teenagers are not the most sexually active, we have the highest rate of teenage pregnancy, okay?
18.cn: 有天，我读到一篇文章上面说，虽然美国青年并不算是最性活跃的，但我们的青少年怀孕率是最高的，知道吗？

19.en: And, although Mr. Moon has not been available for questions, unconfirmed reports suggest he was responsible for building a water tank that exploded and flooded the building.
19.cn: 虽然我们无法找到月伯乐先生的亲口证实，不过根据未证实的消息，他对建造水箱，以及水箱爆炸淹没剧院负有直接责任。
